IT CLUSTER MANAGER SOUTHERN REGION HILTON Houston TX August 2014 to Present Based at Hilton AmericasHouston I also oversee the IT operations of the C Baldwin Downtown previously known as the corporate initiatives and to maintain compliance as technologies advance Accomplishments include Installation of EMV chip and pin terminals at the Front Desk and Retail Outlets to maintain PCI
